short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that provides a seamless way to experience and learn Chinese from websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Alt+A (macOS - option+A) to translate an entire webpage, then hover over individual words to see pinyin pronunciation and definition. All lookups and translations are done locally using the CEDICT dictionary.

This extension is actively under development, please shoot any issues/feedback to the contact address!
